### Related Issue
- Please link the issue(s) this PR addresses:
  Closes #<issue_number>

### Description
- Describe the research, experiment, or spike conducted.
- Explain the goal, approach, and any insights gained.
- Include context, logs, screenshots, or data that help reviewers understand the experiment.

### Implementation Details
- Describe experiment/research approach
- Key observations or changes made
- Dependencies, test scripts, or temporary setups

### Testing
- [ ] Experimental procedure verified
- [ ] Data / logs collected
- [ ] Scripts or tools documented

### Documentation
- [ ] Findings documented
- [ ] Screenshots, tables, or charts are included
- [ ] Any relevant references are added

### Checklist
- [ ] Linked related issue(s)
- [ ] Experiment clearly described
- [ ] All data / results attached
- [ ] PR ready for review

### Risks / Impact
- Potential risks if the experiment affects the main branch
- Temporary code or partial implementation warnings

### Notes
- Additional information, risks, or considerations for future work.
